title: Managing Insurance Costs
description: This chapter explores how to effectively manage insurance costs by understanding key components like deductibles, co-payments, and co-insurance, and how to balance premium costs with coverage needs to make informed financial decisions.
learning_objectives: Understand the basic components of insurance policies, including deductibles, co-payments, and co-insurance
Recognize how different insurance terms impact out-of-pocket costs and financial stability
Learn strategies for selecting insurance policies that balance premium costs with coverage needs
Analyze real-world scenarios to apply these concepts in a practical context

skill_builder.title: Understanding Deductibles, Co-Insurance, and Co-Payments
skill_builder.description: An interactive exercise where students calculate out-of-pocket medical expenses by applying insurance concepts such as deductibles, co-insurance, and co-insurance caps.
